text: so this Banksy mural appeared on a
boarded up shop opposite the French
Embassy on Saturday night and it shows
Cosette from Lane is robbed who's really
the poster girl for Lane is robbed with
a cloud of gas from a CS canister
billowing all around her and tears in
her eyes against the backdrop of the
French flag and beneath the mural itself
is a QR code it's like a barcode if you
scan that it links through to a video of
the French authorities raiding the camps
in Calais earlier this month Banksy has
been very critical about Europe's
handling of the refugee crisis before
and murals similar to this have appeared
in Calais itself and I've been asking
passers-by what they make of this mural
obviously it's topical and you know it's
an inoffensive way of expressing you
know things that are concerning people
today I just stopped by because I saw a
lot of people but the pictures is
amazing this will make a difference
because it will bring more awareness and
we need more awareness because what is
happening there is absolutely terrible
now as you can see over here there is a
little bit of damage to this to where
the murals been placed so we believe
that some people try to take it down
over the weekend and there are reports
here in Knightsbridge today that they
are going to cover this
